divs: sighting detailsi had just driven into the driveway and when i looked up in the sky i saw an airplane like i often do. this time i saw a very shiney oval silver object near the plane that kept slowly moving across the sky. i ran inside and grabbed my digital camera. when i returned, it had passed my house and was going further up in the sky. it still remained very shiney, however, i also now noticed a red blinking light surrounding the object. the shaped of the object became even more clear. it was oval. i have seen many helicopters and many many planes because my house is in the flight path of bush international airport. the silver shiney object was definitely not a plane. i ran in the house and got my husband to come and see this thing and he also saw it. we watched until it disappeared so high in the sky, approximately 3-4 minutes total.i was very excited because i have always wanted to see a ufo, but before,each time i think that i would see one, it turned out to be a plane or helicopter with blades or lights. they were never this silver or shiney.i think the first thing that really caught my attention was the fact that i didn't see bright lights, but the shiney silver. afterwards, i went to my computer to try and see what i had taken a picture of on my camera. only a couple of the pictures actually showed the object without them becoming distorted when making them larger. i was a bit disappointed because i wanted to see it much clearer in pictures. i will send what i do have.------------------------------------------ wit info deleted - sgonzalez\cms.
Summary: I looked up and noticed an airplane and near the airplane was a very shiny oval silver object that kept slowly moving across the sky.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Spring
There were no other sightings in Spring on or around June 17th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
